title: Strengthening CS Practical Skills: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Through Online Advanced Mathematics Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Post logical solutions reflecting peer feedback in discussion forums with over 90% participation in diverse mathematical problem scenarios
Present at least three approaches for applying mathematical concepts discussed in forums to real-world cases (e.g., data analysis, algorithm design)
Critically evaluate peers' problem-solving strategies via peer review (e.g., validity verification, identifying limitations) and propose improvements
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
